Room.Name: Hall of Worldly Bliss
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the inner hall of the cathedral.
Room.LongDescription: Perfectly aligned rows of chairs face the main altar at the east side of the cathedral. The altar itself is a raised platform, from which sermons can be delivered. Above the alter, golden statues of angels appear to be guarding this holy place from harm. On the ceiling, a huge, colorful mural depicts the epic struggle between the heavenly forces of good and the hellspawned armies of underworld.
